caption.title: tertiary and quaternary structure of extracellular domain of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) S protein (PDB: 6VXX, 2.8 Ã…). (A) Top view of the protein trimer. Each monomer is distinctly coloured (blue, light green and red). (B) Side view of the protein. (C) VdW surface of each monomer. (D) Subunits S1 and S2 (violet) of extracellular domain. The S1 subunit is further divided into N terminal (NTD, pink) and C-terminal domains (CTD, green). At the tip of the NTD, the ganglioside-binding domain (GBD) is coloured in blue. CTD is also the receptor-binding domain (RBD).
